items.sentence: Tom really cares about this stuff, doesn\'t he?
Tom said that he\'d like to borrow a few books.
Starting next week, I\'ll be on the late shift.
I want to go outside for a breath of fresh air.
I wanted to prove to myself that I could do it.
Does anything exciting ever happen around here?
Does this letter have to be written in English?
Does this mean that we have to file bankruptcy?
The baby was fast asleep in her mother\'s arms.
Don\'t forget to clean behind the refrigerator.
